info.brief_description: A story of a guy who saves a girl and finds himself filling her role.
info.description:
This is a story about a man named John who saves a girl, and finds himself turned into one in various dangerous or embarrassing situations. John in in his early to mid 20's, he's about 5'10" as a man, besides that, there isn't anything worth noting about him. It's currently assumed that he's Caucasian.

A few rules before writing:

1) John in unaware of the changes at first,

2) John is not as smart as most people, but he's not a complete idiot, it just takes him longer to process information and realize his options.

3) The curse turns him into a woman and forces him in embarrassing or dangerous situations which a man can save him from.

4) The curse does effect him mentally, sometimes, but John doesn't like it.

5) If John is rescued, the curse makes him obliged to 'thank' his rescuer.

6) The curse makes the men around him either act more chivalrous or villainous.

7) The curse won't let John tell anyone who he really is, or that he's cursed.

8) John will occasionally change back into a man when no one is around, but transforms at inopportune times.

9) While I prefer quality over quantity, if a chapter is under 1000 characters, or doesn't have a purpose, there is a good chance it will be deleted.

10) No underage or incestuous material. Also, no copyrighted material or characters.

And remember, have fun, write if you're inspired. If you have a hard time writing it, others will have a hard time reading it.

The rating is PG 13, but it will be changed to a higher rating it there are enough great chapters with heavier material.
